title: How to Unblock a Page on Facebook

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ and sign in. You'll need to use a computer or laptop to view the desktop site instead of the mobile app or a mobile browser. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click ▼.
steps.content: Click ▼ . This downwards pointing arrow is in the top right corner of your browser. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings & Privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & Privacy . You'll see this next to a gear icon in the second grouping of menu options.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . This is usually the first option in the menu next to a gear icon. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click Blocking.
steps.content: Click Blocking . It's in the menu on the left side of the page next to an icon of an avatar with a crossed-out circle next to it. You'll find this option in the second grouping of menu options, towards the middle of the menu. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Unblock.
steps.content: Click Unblock . This is to the right of the page name that you want to unblock. It's under the "Blocked Pages" header. [5] X Research source If you've navigated to the blocked page, you can also click the three-dot menu icon (under the cover photo) and select Unblock . You can also unblock people, apps, event invites, app invites, and messages on this page.
